user.title: Solar AC Controller setup
user.description:
Configure how the controller manages your AC zones based on solar production and grid usage.

Tip: Define zones in the order you want them to be activated. All settings can be adjusted later from the Options menu.

data_description.ac_power_sensor: Sensor that reports the AC unit's current power draw.
data_description.ac_switch: Main switch that powers the AC system.
data_description.zones: List of climate entities to control. Order determines activation priority.
data_description.initial_learned_power: Starting estimate of zone power usage before learning kicks in.

init.title: Solar AC Controller options
init.description:
Adjust sensors, zones, thresholds and safety settings.

Zone order determines activation priority. Panic settings protect your inverter from overload.

data_description.solar_threshold_on: Solar must exceed this value to enable the AC master switch.
data_description.solar_threshold_off: Solar must fall below this value to disable the AC master switch.
data_description.panic_threshold: If grid import exceeds this value, zones are shed to protect the inverter.
data_description.panic_delay: Delay before panic shedding is executed.
data_description.manual_lock_seconds: When a user manually changes a zone, it is locked for this duration.
data_description.short_cycle_on_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay ON before it can be turned OFF.
data_description.short_cycle_off_seconds: Minimum time a zone must stay OFF before it can be turned ON.
data_description.add_confidence: Minimum confidence required to add a new zone.
data_description.remove_confidence: Minimum negative confidence required to remove a zone.

error.no_zones: You must define at least one climate zone.
error.invalid_solar_hysteresis: Solar OFF threshold must be lower than Solar ON threshold.
error.panic_too_low: Panic threshold should be safely above the Solar ON threshold.
